hero.title: Aromas de Alcalá
hero.subtitle: Your private sanctuary. Exclusive rural villa in the heart of Andalusia.

intro.title: Silent luxury and disconnection
intro.quote: "More than a rural house, an experience of absolute privacy and superior comfort for those who value details."
intro.description: An exclusive villa in a privileged location between Córdoba, Granada, and Jaén. The ideal starting point to discover the essence of the south without sacrificing maximum comfort.

features.label: Premium Spaces
features.title: Spaciousness, Design, and Privacy
features.description_1: The villa offers 6 suite-style bedrooms, designed for absolute rest. Four feature double beds and two have twin beds, all with private en-suite bathrooms for maximum privacy.
features.description_2: Enjoy a large open-plan living room with an open gourmet kitchen, ideal for gathering. Outside, your private oasis: covered porch, solarium, and an impressive saltwater pool exclusively for you.

high_season.title: High Season
items: Long weekends, holidays, and Christmas break

cta_section.title: Secure your exclusive dates
cta_section.subtitle: The luxury of not having to share. Your private villa awaits.

policy.title: Admission Policy
policy.text: We reserve the right of admission. We do not accept bookings from organized youth groups, especially when the main purpose is parties or activities that may disturb the tranquility of the environment or alter the accommodation conditions.

amenities.label: Everything you need
amenities.title: Our Facilities
amenities.description: Enjoy a fully equipped house where traditional design meets modern comfort. Spacious, bright spaces designed for the enjoyment of the whole family.

features.title: Wifi included
features.description: Several spaces prepared for remote working with high-speed internet.

features.title: Equipped Kitchen
features.description: Features American fridge, oven, dishwasher, microwave, breakfast bar, ceramic hob, coffee maker, kettle, kitchenware...

features.title: Spacious Outdoors
features.description: Property surrounded by spacious exteriors, porch, saltwater pool, and private covered parking.

features.title: Clean Energy
features.description: Equipped with solar panels on the roof, the house generates its own clean and renewable energy.

features.title: Outdoor BBQ
features.description: Next to the porch, we have a covered built-in barbecue with an outdoor bar.

features.title: Prepared Bedrooms
features.description: We'll have everything ready for your stay: bedding, towels, hairdryer, gel, and shampoo.

extras: Accessible bathroom on the ground floor (no stairs)
